tossup_question: 19) CHEMISTRY  What is the name given to the only temperature and pressure at which all three phases of water can be in equilibrium with each other?
bonus_question: 19) CHEMISTRY  Which of the following factors does NOT affect the solubility of a solid in a liquid?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Temperature
X) Polarity of solute 
Y) Polarity of solvent 
Z) Pressure
